bibl.title: Letter from John J. Kelly to Albert E. Truby, [n.d.] [Enclosed in 06507062]

div1.p: Kelly thanks Truby for the information he sent him about Finlay because the Universidad De Villanueva wants to honor him.

div1.head: Letter from John J. Kelly to Albert E. Truby, [n.d.] [Enclosed in 06507062]
div1.opener:
COPY
UNIVERSIDAD DE VILLANUEVA
Apto. No. 6, Marianao, Cuba
Mr. Albert E. Truby, Brigadier Gral.
U. S. Army, Retired
145 Laurel Street
San Francisco 18, Calif.
Dear Gral. Truby:
div1.p:
Many thanks for your prompt reply to our request for information
about Dr. Carlos Finlay, outstanding medical scientist of Latin
America. I shall try to get a copy of your book to learn more
about Dr. Finlay.

The University wants to give honor to whom honor is due and it
seems most evident that Dr. Carlos Finlay is the most apt person
to be celebrated.
Our most sincere thanks for your recommendation on out initiative.

closer.signed: V. Rev. John J. Kelly, O.S.A.
